page.title: Document Manager, a document manager
page.adminModule: As part of our application, two distinct modules shape a rich and complete experience. On the one hand, an administration module, accessible exclusively to platform administrators, offers total control over the structuring of documents. On the other hand, a document visualization and management module, open to all connected users, allows intuitive exploration and collaborative contribution.
page.uploadDocuments: The application makes it easy to put documents online, organizing them into categories and subcategories that can be configured by administrators. These define the available categories and assign subcategories to each, thus forming a flexible structure. Let's take the example of a category Sport with subcategories such as "Racket sports", "Team sports", and "Combat Sports".
page.readAndDownload: All users can read and download the documents posted online. A filter panel offers efficient searching by category, title, description and author. Users can also propose adding documents to an existing subcategory, a process subject to approval by an administrator.
page.documentApproval: A document, consisting of a title, a description and a downloadable file, requires the approval of an administrator before being accessible to everyone. A page dedicated to documents awaiting validation offers administrators a complete view, also accessible to users to follow their proposals.
page.interactionFeatures: The interaction does not end there. Users can subscribe to a category or subcategory, receiving email notifications each time a document is added after validation. The email template is customizable via the administration module, allowing the insertion of dynamic fields such as URL, title and description of the document.
